description:
With detailed explanatory answers written by certified industry experts, our exam prep bundle is superior in content and UI to more expensive competitors.
   *  
Upward Mobility’s CompTIA A+ Bundle for the 220-701 (Essentials) and 220-702 (Practical Application) 220-701 is a tool to help you achieve CompTIA’s A+ certification.  With 201 questions and answers, we recommend this tool as a supplemental study tool or practice test.
   *  
In our module, each question is paired with an explanatory answer and a Key Takeaway.  The Key Takeaway is designed to ensure that the crucial learning point of the question is mastered.  Not only that, Key Takeaways support the answer with important insights on how to practically apply the knowledge in a real world situation so you can be more successful in your career.
  *  
Topics Covered include:
Hardware
Security
Networking
Operating Systems
  *  
The A+ certification is a widely accepted international, vendor-neutral certification that proves competence in areas such as installation, preventative maintenance, networking, security and troubleshooting. 
  *  
The CompTIA 220-701 A+ Essentials exam is designed to measure the competency of an entry-level IT professional. The exam measures your ability to support computers and install, configure, troubleshoot, optimize, diagnose and perform preventive maintenance in the field or in organization.  
  *  The CompTIA A+ Practical Application (220-702) is an extension of the knowledge and skills identified in the Essentials module.  220-702 focuses on scenarios in which troubleshooting and tools must be applied to resolve problems. 
   *  
This app is not affiliated with the Computing Technology Industry Association.
